name: Addigted
description:
[EN]
Addigted is an arcade game taking place in space. You embody a little miner who tries to retrieve his lost tools !
Dig through various planets, find your tools and grab some gemstones !

[FR]
Addigted est un jeu d'arcade qui se déroule dans l'espace. Vous incarnez un petit mineur qui tente de retrouver ses outils perdus !
Creusez à travers diverses planètes, récupérez vos outils et attraper quelques pierres précieuses au passage

[EDIT]
Just uploaded the 1.4 version 4 hours after the Jam deadline, with some fixes and impovements!

[EN] Game made during the Global Game Jam 2021 : "Lost and Found"

[FR]  Jeu créé durant la Global Game Jam 2021 : "Lost and Found"

William Comminges: Tech Artist

Lucas Guibert: Gameplay Programmer

Alexis Thiebaut: Gameplay Programmer

Sarah Monfort-Ginet: 2D artist, animator

Manuel Pelaez Taracena: 2D artist 

Loïc Berger : 2D artist

Matthieu Rauber: Sound-Designer
